UI components for building AI chatbots

Related repos

  • Next.js chat interface for LangGraph servers
  • Chatbox: open-source chat app for local AI or custom models
  • Reference implementations for building chatbots with memory and search
  • chat-based open-source assistant that can run language models and connect with other apps
  • AI chat platform supporting various language models and tools, inspired by ChatGPT
  • UI design language and React library for conversational interfaces
  • framework for building and deploying stateful AI agents
  • lets agents remember and learn from past chats
  • Open source chat platform for building AI bots with API integration and file sharing features
